verses.text: B'itejec ak' b'it t'a Jehová. Ilecnab' tas satub'tac ix sk'ulej. A' ix onh colan a onh schonhab' onh tik yet' yipalil axonhej ochi.
Ix sch'oxel scolwal Jehová, ix sch'oxan yil juntzanh niwac nación to tojol syutej spactzitan t'a heb' ajk'ol yajoch t'ay.
Ix elnhejk'och tas ix yal t'ayonh a onh schonhab' Israel onh tik. Ix yak'cot swach'k'olal t'ayonh. Masanto t'a slajwub' yol yib'anhk’inal tik ix ilchaji to ix onh colchaj yuj ko Diosal.
Ex kajan ex t'a masanil sat lu'um tik, b'itananhec t'a Jehová t'a tzalajk'olal. Hak'ek eyip he b'itan t'ay t'a tzalajk'olal.
B'itejec b'it t'a Jehová yet' te' arpa yet' te' ay sch'anhal.
B'itananhec t'a Jehová ko Reyal t'a tzalajk'olal. B'itananhec, tze pu'an k'een trompeta, tze pu'anpax nok' ch'aac.
B'itanokab' ha' mar yet' masanil nok' nok' ay t'a yol ha'. B'itanokab'pax yol yib'anhk’inal tik yet' heb' kajan t'ay.
k'anhokab' ha' niwac ha' yuj tzalajk'olal. Junlajanokab' tz'aj yawaj lum niwac witz t'a tzalajk'olal t'a yichanh Jehová,
yujto ol jawok, ol ul yak'an Yajalil t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik. A' ol ak'an Yajalil, junlajan ol yutoc sch'olb'itan juntzanh chonhab' t'a stojolal.
